summary: The IHE Nonprofit Clarity Act (H.R. 1852) aims to clarify the definition of a "nonprofit institution of higher education" under the Higher Education Act of 1965. Specifically, the bill mandates that any institution of higher education recognized as a nonprofit organization under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code is automatically considered a nonprofit institution for the purposes of the Higher Education Act. This seeks to ensure consistent application of the Act to such institutions.
